contents.appointmentLongReminder: Reminder for @member.honorific@ @member.lastName@'s appointment on @appointment.time@ with @user.firstName@ from Laguna Health.
contents.appointmentReminder: Hello @member.honorific@ @member.lastName@, your appointment with @user.firstName@ from Laguna Health starts in @gapMinutes@ minutes; to join, click: @chatLink@
contents.appointmentRequest: Hello @member.honorific@ @member.lastName@, It's @user.firstName@ from Laguna Health. Click below to schedule your next meeting: @appLink@
contents.appointmentUser: Hello @user.firstName@, an appointment has been added to your schedule on @appointment.start@
contents.downloadPage: Hello @member.honorific@ @member.lastName@, I'm @user.firstName@ from Laguna Health. We partnered with @org.name@ to provide you free post-hospital recovery support. Click below to schedule the first visit: @downloadLink@
contents.downloadPageWithoutOrg: Hello @member.honorific@ @member.lastName@, I'm @user.firstName@ from Laguna Health. We are here to provide you free post-hospital recovery support. Click below to schedule the first visit: @downloadLink@
contents.newMemberNudge: Hello @member.honorific@ @member.lastName@, I'm @user.firstName@ from Laguna Health. Friendly reminder to schedule your first visit: @downloadLink@
contents.newChatMessage: You have a new message from @user.firstName@
